issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product
resolution.name: Not Our Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Orientation change has slow performance. It takes almost two seconds for the app to change orientations. Video attached (4.0 device - Galaxy Nexus).

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Create and run a default app.
2. Rotate the device.
3. Observe orientation change.

Expected Result:

App should re-orient almost instantly.

Actual Result:

App takes 2 seconds to re-orient.
fields.summary: Android: Orientation: orientation change has slow performance on Android 4.0 device
fields.environment:
SDK: 1.9.0.v20120111103135
Android: V8/Rhino
Studio: 1.0.8
OS: Lion
Devices Tested: Galaxy Nexus 4.0.2

comments.body:
I think its a device specific issue,When tested on my device  observed that it rotate instantly.

Tested on:

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.2.201302191606
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
Device: Samsung galaxy s duos Android version: 4.0.4
Samsung Galaxy GT-S6012 android 4.0
Android Emulator: Android SDK version: 2.2

I am unable to reproduce this issue and inclined to say that was device specific. This was tested with the following environment;
Pixel (7.1)
Studio 4.9.0.201705302345
Ti SDK 6.1.1 GA
Appc NPM 4.2.9
Appc CLI 6.2.2
Ti CLI 5.0.14
Alloy 1.9.11
Xcode 8.2 (8C38)
Node v4.8.2
Java 1.8.0_131
